${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Strike.NAME: Strike
${modID}:Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random target, then deal !${modID}:StrikeSecondHitDamage! damage to a second random target.

${modID}:SixGunRoulette.NAME: Six Gun Roulette
${modID}:SixGunRoulette.DESCRIPTION: Choose a target at random to lose !D! HP. If  damages herself, gain !B! block.

${modID}:HeelKick.NAME: Heel Kick
${modID}:HeelKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then randomly apply either !${modID}:HeelKickWeak! Weak or NL !${modID}:HeelKickVulnerable! Vulnerable. ${modID}:Unexpected.

${modID}:ThisIsBoring.NAME: This is Boring!
${modID}:ThisIsBoring.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 for this combat.

${modID}:WaitForIt.NAME: Wait For It
${modID}:WaitForIt.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, increase the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the rest of combat.

${modID}:AnticipationIsKing.NAME: Anticipation is King
${modID}:AnticipationIsKing.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Deal !D! for each card discarded to a random enemy.

${modID}:DommyVibes.NAME: Dommy Vibes
${modID}:DommyVibes.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:DommyVibesWeakAmount! Weak and NL !${modID}:DommyVibesVulnerableAmount! Vulnerable to an enemy.

${modID}:SadMask.NAME: Sad Mask
${modID}:SadMask.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumWeak! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumWeak! Weak, !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumVulnerable! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumVulnerable! Vulnerable, and !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumFrail! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumFrail! Frail to yourself and the target enemy. NL ${modID}:Fixed.
${modID}:SadMask.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumWeak! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumWeak! Weak, !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumVulnerable! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumVulnerable! Vulnerable, and !${modID}:SadMaskMinimumFrail! to !${modID}:SadMaskMaximumFrail! Frail to yourself once and the target enemy twice. NL ${modID}:Fixed

${modID}:LeaveItToChance.NAME: Leave it to Chance!
${modID}:LeaveItToChance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If heads, gain 1 energy, if tails, gain !${modID}:LeaveItToChanceBlockAmount! block.

${modID}:HeadsIWinTailsYouLose.NAME: Heads I Win, Tails You Lose!
${modID}:HeadsIWinTailsYouLose.DESCRIPTION: Flip a coin. If heads, gain !${modID}:HIWTYLEnergyGain! energy and draw !${modID}:HIWTYLNumCards! card(s). If tails, deal !D! damage and *Exhaust.

${modID}:Showstopper.NAME: Showstopper
${modID}:Showstopper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card costing 0 energy in your hand.
${modID}:Showstopper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice for each card costing 0 energy in your hand.

${modID}:FireworksDisplay.NAME: Fireworks Display
${modID}:FireworksDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !${modID}:FireworksDisplayNumBaseHits! to !${modID}:FireworksDisplayNumMaxHits! times. NL ${modID}:Fixed.

${modID}:HurryUp.NAME: Hurry Up!
${modID}:HurryUp.DESCRIPTION: *Retain your energy and hand, then end your turn.

${modID}:AllOfLifeIsAStage.NAME: All of Life is a Stage
${modID}:AllOfLifeIsAStage.DESCRIPTION: Randomly gain from !${modID}:AoLiaSStrengthMinimum! to !${modID}:AoLiaSStrengthMaximum! Strength and NL !${modID}:AoLiaSDexterityMinimum! to !${modID}:AoLiaSDexterityMaximum! Dexterity. NL ${modID}:Fixed.

${modID}:SayIt.NAME: SAY IT!
${modID}:SayIt.DESCRIPTION: If you have unexpected, inflict NL !${modID}:SayItMinimumWeak! to !${modID}:SayItMaximumWeak! Weak on a random enemy. NL ${modID}:Fixed.

${modID}:Pation.NAME: PATION!
${modID}:Pation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 ${modID}:Unexpected. Gain 1 energy on your next turn.

${modID}:TalkToTheHand.NAME: Talk to the Hand
${modID}:TalkToTheHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:TalkToTheHandMinimumBlock! to !${modID}:TalkToTheHandMaximumBlock! Block. NL Repeat a ${modID}:Fixed !${modID}:TalkToTheHandMinimumBlockTimes! to !${modID}:TalkToTheHandMaximumBlockTimes! times.

${modID}:OnTheOtherPatience.NAME: On the Other, Patience
${modID}:OnTheOtherPatience.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !${modID}:OnTheOtherPatienceMinStrength! to !${modID}:OnTheOtherPatienceMaxStrength! temporary Strength.

${modID}:Dreamdiver.NAME: Dreamdiver
${modID}:Dreamdiver.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of your next attack this turn by 25%.
${modID}:Dreamdiver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of your next attack this turn by 50%.

${modID}:DancePartner.NAME: Dance Partner
${modID}:DancePartner.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy, if it is attacking, inflict !${modID}:DancePartnerAmount! Weak, otherwise inflict !${modID}:DancePartnerAmount! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Defenseless.NAME: Defenseless
${modID}:Defenseless.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from target enemy.
${modID}:Defenseless.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from target enemy. Do it again at the start of your turn.

${modID}:Powerless.NAME: Powerless
${modID}:Powerless.DESCRIPTION: Remove all positive strength from you and all enemies.

${modID}:KeepUp.NAME: Keep Up!
${modID}:KeepUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:KeepUpDamage! damage and inflict !${modID}:KeepUpWeak Weak to the target.
${modID}:KeepUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:KeepUpDamage! damage and inflict !${modID}:KeepUpWeak! Weak to all enemies.

${modID}:DodgeThis.NAME: Dodge This!
${modID}:DodgeThis.DESCRIPTION: Smack the target with a car for !${modID}:DodgeThisDamage! damage. Gain 1 ${modID}:Unexpected.

${modID}:ItsFreeRealEstate.NAME: It's Free Real Estate
${modID}:ItsFreeRealEstate.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card in your hand. *Retain. *Exhaust.

${modID}:ATallFrostyGlass.NAME: A Tall Frosty Glass
${modID}:ATallFrostyGlass.DESCRIPTION: ... Of Just Ice! Gain !${modID}:ATallFrostyGlassThornsAmount! Thorns each time you are attacked this turn.

${modID}:IllusionOfChoice.NAME: Illusion Of Choice
${modID}:IllusionOfChoice.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Target an enemy (who loses !${modID}:IllusionOfChoiceStrengthAmount! Strength) or yourself (to gain !${modID}:IllusionOfChoiceDexterityAmount! Dexterity.)

${modID}:IOCLoseStrength.NAME: Lose Strength
${modID}:IOCLoseStrength.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !${modID}:IOCStrLoss! Strength. Ethereal. Exhaust.

${modID}:FeignedMadness.NAME: Feigned Madness
${modID}:FeignedMadness.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a card in your hand to 1 for this turn. Exhaust.
${modID}:FeignedMadness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a card in your hand to 1 for this turn.

${modID}:GrabABottle.NAME: Grab A Bottle
${modID}:GrabABottle.DESCRIPTION: Grab a bottle of SoulGlad~ NL (Obtain a NL random potion.) NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GrabABottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grab a bottle of SoulGlad~ NL (Obtain a NL random potion.)

${modID}:CaptivatingPerformance.NAME: Captivating Performance
${modID}:CaptivatingPerformance.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy cannot gain strength this turn.

${modID}:BreakDance.NAME: Break Dance
${modID}:BreakDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:BreakDanceMinDamage! to !${modID}:BreakDanceMaxDamage! damage and inflict !${modID}:BreakDanceVulnerableAmount! vulnerable randomly !${modID}:BreakDanceNumberHits! times.

${modID}:WithoutACare.NAME: Without A Care
${modID}:WithoutACare.DESCRIPTION: You cannot gain any more block this turn. Deal !${modID}:WithoutACareMinDamage! to !${modID}:WithoutACareMaxDamage! damage randomly.
